---
title: "Baby Names"
---

# Packages + Data
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(babynames)
```
# Load Data Frame
```{r}
df1 <- babynames
```

# Seperate Males and Females

```{r}

df_f = df1  |>
  filter(sex == "F")


df_m = df1  |>
  filter(sex == "M")
```


# What is the most popular Female name?

```{r}
fmax = max(df_f$prop)

mmax = max(df_m$prop)

df_f  |>
  filter(prop == fmax)


df_m  |>
  filter(prop == mmax)
```
# Mary Popularity over time

```{r}
df_mary = df_f |>
  filter(name == "Mary")
```

# Plot of Mary Popularity
```{r}
df_mary |>
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = prop)) + geom_col()
```
From the graph, we can see that the name Mary overall follows a downward trend
